analysis.description:
ClaimableCrowdsale.claimFor (/unique_chucks/8/0x903e7414cb54e44766dcf03e4ab424fdf9259d78.sol#466-478) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(bankAddress,_receiver,tokensToSend) (/unique_chucks/8/0x903e7414cb54e44766dcf03e4ab424fdf9259d78.sol#474-477)

ClaimableCrowdsale.finish (/unique_chucks/8/0x903e7414cb54e44766dcf03e4ab424fdf9259d78.sol#486-491) does not use the value returned by external calls:
